bio:
Food stylist & Food Photographer
Cat lady • Part-time traveler⠀
🔜 Paris, Japan
✎cravingsinamsterdam@outlook.com

posts.caption:
Ricotta red velvet pancakes with Greek yogurt frosting. I used beet powder to get this beautiful red color. You can also reduce beet juice into a syrup for the same effect. Perfect for Mother’s day! Find the recipe on my blog. Clickable link in my bio @cravingsinamsterdam
For more delicious brunch ideas, check out @beautifulcuisines
When your hubby tells you to shake the peonies. #WHP🙂 Dress by @augustethelabel
Take me back to @waltdisneyworld . Have you been? If you have, to which one?
Be a sunflower, stand strong & follow the sun
Tag your brunch partner 🥐🍳🥑

It’s #NationalCheeseDay and of course I had to celebrate with my current favorite grilled cheese sandwich. French Munster cheese, thinly sliced pear & quince jam. And because I felt like indulging, I topped it with Ibérico Ham. What’s your favorite cheese?

Hot days are better with cold meals. Poke bowl with salmon marinated in sesame dressing, spiralized cucumber, pineapple, radish and avocado. The one in the back has spicy tuna with mango, wakame and pomegranate seeds.

A little bit of NL in Bruges. This time I covered the stroopwafels with matcha white chocolate & freeze dried raspberries. #thetravellingstroopwafel
.
.
.
For more food inspiration, check out @beautifulcuisines
Fried pickles make a great burger topping. I used panko to make them extra crunchy. For more dinner inspiration. Check out @beautifulcuisines
Amsterdam, you never lose your charm! 🍂🧡

Finally visited Bruges. Such a beautiful city and just a 2.5 hour drive from Amsterdam. A big thank you to @ramonalouisse from @cosmozuidas for coloring my hair.
Dress by @augustethelabel
#cosmohairstyling #augustethelabel
Porto 💛. Are you doing a staycation or traveling this summer?

Amsterdam dressed in spring!
A little reminder if you want to win a leather bag. The giveaway is open internationally. See my other Wisteria post to enter. Winner will be announced on Friday.
Not a bad way to start a Wednesday! Delicious healthy freakshake, mermaid bowl, Bali bowl and poached eggs with salmon. And yes, that’s an edible mermaid tail. New menu at @plukamsterdam

GIVEAWAY CLOSED. The winner is @lissiwissi . Please check your DM. International Giveaway: I’ve partnered with @lumifinland to giveaway this Olivia Mini Saddler leather shoulder bag in the color of your choice! If you can’t wait, I also have a 25% off discount code for one normal priced item. The code is CRAVINGSINAMSTERDAM and it’s valid till the 20th of June.
To enter the giveaway:
1. Follow me: @cravingsinamsterdam
2. Follow @lumifinland
3. Tag a friend in the comment section below
The giveaway runs until Thursday the 24th of May. Winner will be announced on Friday 25th of May.
Lumi’s motto is Love it, keep it! They want to encourage people to only buy pieces that you love 100%. To be selective and invest in quality & durability. When you love it, you’ll keep it and wear it for years, instead of just a season.
#paidpartnership #lumifinland #loveitkeepit

Acai bowls for this hot morning! I blended frozen Acai pulp with frozen blackberries, banana, agave syrup and oat milk. Topped it with homemade oat & coconut granola, strawberries, freeze dried raspberries and a little drizzle of peanut butter.
Love these long summer days! What’s your favorite thing about summer?
Which one would you eat first?
A little throwback to early spring. I’ve always been a summer kind of girl but spring just takes my breath away.

Different from your traditional pizzas and so delicious! Pictured here is the Philly cheese steak pie. We also really liked the Bee sting pie with Calabrian sausage & red pepper honey. Happy that I finally ticked @thefatpie off my list.

Some time to relax with a picnic in the garden of the @cloudybay villa in Mallorca. We harvested the zucchini flowers at a local farm in the morning & then went boating. We finished the day with a wonderful dinner al fresco and of course tasted delicious wine.
#Cloudybay #Comesailaway #ad

You guys requested this recipe from my stories, so it is now up on the blog. Kale & harissa roasted chickpea salad. It makes a great packed lunch too. Link to the recipe in my bio @cravingsinamsterdam
I have a thing for colorful streets!

You don’t always have to travel far to find magical locations. Castle de Haar is located in Utrecht, just a 30 min drive from Amsterdam. The location is beautiful, you can bring your own picnic and they have an area with 🦌. This was our second visit. Have you been here? (More on my stories)

Peruvian shrimp risotto. This dish has a bit of a kick because of the Aji Amarillo (yellow chili). And also goes very well with some crispy fried calamari. The recipe is on my blog. Clickable link in my bio @cravingsinamsterdam
Fried egg, smoked salmon, avo & chive cream cheese on an everything bagel.

Love these long warm(ish 😅) days and spending them with my favorite human 💕.
In our garden with lots of food and Ketel One & soda. @Ketelone #familyyoumake #ketelone #sp
Yesterday we went to a forest & foraged some chestnuts. More on my stories. I ALMOST grabbed dog poo while picking the leafs to throw in the air 😂 💩 #keepingitreal

Not quite ready for autumn. Are you?
For more dinner inspiration, check out @beautifulcuisines
Cheers to the weekend! Made a Ketel One Vodka Bloody Mary and topped it with fried chicken & maple-glazed bacon. @ketelone #familyyoumake #ketelone #spon

Gimme pasta and I’m happy! My Spaghetti alle Vongole recipe just got a very needed picture update on my blog (link in the bio). If you are looking for something fun to do this weekend, Ketel One Vodka is hosting workshops and a brunch at @tasteofamsterdam. More info on the Taste of Amsterdam website. @Ketelone
#familyyoumake #ketelone #sp

Had to take a little break from posting here because some styling projects were taking all of my time but I’m back with a new recipe. These al pastor cauliflower tacos are super easy to make & they are vegan. You can find the recipe on my blog. Link in my bio @cravingsinamsterdam
When a Wednesday feels like a Friday! Tasting the new Hemingway inspired cocktails with my dear @hashtagbylily at @pulitzersbar.amsterdam. Plus how cute is this corner where you can play board games!
